content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Explore the facilities available in our eight libraries to support your studies, research and teaching. For services at Manuscripts and Special Collections, visit the Reading Room webpage. The University provides a range of rooms on every campus for prayer and religious observance. Visit the Chaplaincy website for a list of locations. You are welcome to bring drinks and cold food in to our libraries. Please do not eat hot food in our libraries - only in designated cafe spaces. All cafe locations and opening times WasteNott - find a fountain King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
